product.name: BioLink
product.description: A link-in-bio tool for creators who want more control. Build your branded page, track your audience, and grow your following.
product.target_audience: content creators, small businesses, influencers, entrepreneurs

selling_points: Built-in analytics - track views and clicks
Fast loading - instant on any device
Easy to use - no coding required

faq.question: How is BioLink different from Linktree?
faq.answer: BioLink offers unlimited links, custom domains, and advanced analytics at a fraction of the price. Plus, no BioLink branding on your page.

faq.question: Can I use my own domain?
faq.answer: Yes! Pro users can connect custom domains for a fully branded experience.

faq.question: Is there a free trial?
faq.answer: Yes, our free plan includes 5 links and basic analytics. Upgrade anytime.

faq.question: How does analytics work?
faq.answer: Track views, clicks, and audience location. Pro users get advanced analytics with more insights.

promotional: Stop limiting your links. Get unlimited with BioLink Pro
